about_the_game:
Super Space Frogs is a 2D physics-based rocket game. Design, Deploy, and Fly awesome space crafts using a wide variety of ship components.

On a barren desert planet, the inhabiting frog civilization struggles to survive. Forced underground due to the harsh surface conditions, their species' continued existence is threatened. The newly elected Frog President has just issued a radical new policy change, throwing all of the planet's resources into space exploration. As the head of this new space program, your fellow frogs are counting on you!

Rocket Ship Designer

Take advantage of a flexible ship designer, using a drag and drop interface to connect together various ship components. Rocket engines, fuel tanks, command pods. Anything you need to save your species, the government will find a way to get it!

Physics-Based Flight

The 2D physics system provides a challenging and immersive rocket flight experience. Build strong and stable ships, keep your velocity in check, and try not to break off any of your ship components along the way (They're really expensive).

Research

Conduct experiments to learn about the world around you. Unlock new technology to build bigger and better rockets. For the glory and perseverance of the frogs!

Build Facilities

Found a juicy titanium deposit on the Muun? Deploy a mining facility to suck up all those resources! Need more space marines for the cause? Build another colony facility and pump those numbers up. Rely less and less on purchasing resources as you build up your own facility network. 

Story

Why is the Frog president so keen on rapidly expanding the space program? Is it truly the only way to survive? Either way, you've been given free reign and a fat check to get you started. Explore the solar system and unlocks the mysteries it holds.
